name: Flipshot
description:
Take control of Flip and break every brick!

Flipshot is a Breakout style game with exciting challenges and a unique aesthetic. Use Flip to break every brick on screen and complete each level.

FEATURES:
- Action packed brick breaking challenges 🧱⚪️
- Full keyboard and controller support ⌨️🎮
- Real life landscape footage 🎥🏞
- Bangin' original soundtrack 🎧📀
- Dynamic sound effects 🔊👂
- Unlockable extras! 🔓🎁
